Permanency: Progress:  The patient's biological parents have been working with Lifeline Children's Services and planned to put the patient up for adoption. At this time, the birth parents are responsible for providing consent. Once the patient is three days old, the adoption agency will provide documentation identifying the responsible consenting party.
